headline: Why Broadcom (AVGO) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of fabless chip and software maker Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) fell 4.2% in the morning session after stocks in the semiconductor sector pulled back, driven by underwhelming news from key industry peers.

headline: Coca-Cola Volumes Dip in Key Markets: Premium Pricing to Save the Day?
summary: KO weathers global volume declines with a 5% y/y organic revenue rise, fueled by premium pricing and strong brand execution.

headline: 1 Incredible Reason to Buy This Dividend Stock Before Oct. 22
summary: Investors can clock a relatively high payout if they snap up some shares before the next earnings report.

headline: Apollo Explores Costa Acquisition from Coca-Cola (KO)
summary: The Coca-Cola Company (NYSE:KO) is one of the best long-term stocks to invest in according to Warren Buffett. On August 27, Apollo Global Management entered early-stage talks with Coca-Cola’s advisers about a potential acquisition of Costa Coffee. While discussions are ongoing, formal bids are not expected for several weeks, and Apollo may ultimately opt out […]
